Institute.Name: National Institute of Technology Agartala

About.History: The Government of India converted the Tripura Engineering College to National Institute of Technology Agartala on 1st April 2006...
About.DirectorMessage: The National Institute of Technology Agartala(NITA), an Institute of National Importance (INI) was instituted by Government of India...

CampusLife.Location: The Institute is located in the midst of serene greenery, about 4 km from National Highway and 20 km from Agartala city.
CampusLife.Transport: Direct air link with Kolkata, Delhi, Chennai, Bangalore, Hyderabad, Guwahati and Imphal. Nearest railway station is Jirania.
CampusLife.Programs: 9 B.Tech branches, 23 M.Tech specializations, 4 Dual Degree branches, MBA, MCA, M.Sc., Ph.D.
CampusLife.MedicalUnit: Equipped with Medical Officers, pharmacists, and support staff.
CampusLife.NCC: NCC unit for Boys and Girls
CampusLife.StudentGymkhana: Active body for co-curricular and extracurricular activities.
CampusLife.TechnicalCulturalClubs: Participation in national level Technical Fests and various clubs.
CampusLife.TrainingPlacement: Centre for Career Development (CCD) to assist students in career exploration and job search.
